text: Cher played an epic game of “ Spill Your Guts or Fill Your Guts ” while making an appearance on last night ’ s ( June 19 ) London edition of The Late Late Show with James Corden! The premise of the game is that James gets to pick a disgusting item for the celeb to eat if they refuse to answer a juicy question. Cher also got to ask James questions and watch him chow down as well. For her first question, James asked Cher to name her top four lovers in addition to Tom Cruise who she has previously claimed as part of the elite Top 5. Cher shrieked and laughed, then opted to eat a dried caterpillar instead – Watch the hilarious segment below! Spill Your Guts or Fill Your Guts w / Ch
